author: chris-dollin
msg: refactored factory rules loader for cleanliness

author: chris-dollin
msg: Extended to allow rules-sets to be specified in-line, with a rule-set
contents itself being given by rule-strings or by rule-URLs.

author: chris-dollin
msg: Added RuleReasoner, to allow tests to work with abstract rule-based reasoners,
and WrappedRuleReasonerFactory, a RuleReasonerFactory that wraps another
one and adds its rules to any created RuleReasoner.

author: chris-dollin
msg: Moved the code for reading from a URL and skipping comment lines into
Rule. ReasonerFactory specs now create a wrapped rule reasoner as

author: chris-dollin
msg: StatementBase demands a non-null Model. Adjusted TestReasoners to
not use the null-model constructor, but it turns out that the
ResourceFactory uses it too - and never tests the Model part.
So hacked an empty model into StementImpl but needs revision.
